A fresh coat of paint. Cleaned up UI and app icon.

VIDEO!!!
- Make your videos shine as bright as your photos with new video preset support
- Use videos in templates
- Overall major performance and speed enhancements

Subscription bug fixes!

Have you upgraded to a video membership, but are still unable to edit videos? Try this.

1. Delete and then reinstall the app. You should be good to go!

If that still doesn't work...

2. Tap "Restore" on the top left of the subscription or upgrade screen.

Still having problems? Email help@tezzanyc.com
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- Copy and paste your edits for speedy batch editing across photos and videos
- Manage your photo + video library in the Tezza App
- Bug fixes, performance enhancements

Thank you for all of the love and support!

xx
Team Tezza
Better UX to get started using the Tezza App
- video saving bug fixes and performance improvements

- Initial launch crash fixed
- Other bug fixes

Introducing 3 sweet new features!
- Vintage Film Effects
- HSL
- Better Exposure & Brightness Settings

We love our Tezza app fam. Keep the feedback coming so we can make the best editing app ever.

xx
Cole & Tezza

- Fresh coat of paint! New and improved UI, colors, and buttons.
- Compatible with iOS 13
- Bug fixes based on user feedback
Critical bug fix for crash upon app launch

- Bug fix for the crash on launch bug for some users

Thank you for your patience while we fixed this!

xx
Cole & Tezza

- Revamped main Presets layout to fix crash upon launch bug

Thank you for your patience while we fixed this!

- For the month of January get ONE MONTH FREE!! Woo hoo! New year, new you, new presets.

Thank you for the love and support, can't wait to see what you create in 2020.

xx
Cole & Tezza

- Brand new Film preset! Effortless and cool, just like your favorite pair of blue jeans.
- New and improved grain controls. You can now change, size, amount and roughness of your grain.

xx
Tezza & Cole

- 1 Month Free Trial extended indefinitely. Woo hoo!
- Bug fixes 
• Pasting grain from photos to videos maintains grain animation

- New Stop Motion effect!!
- Improved Vintage Film effect with more control over grain, specs, lines, blur, and vignette
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

We love you!

- Subtitles! Add vintage inspired subtitles for some cinematic flair to your photos and videos.
- Improved UX and bug fixes.

Bug fix for users that couldn't dismiss the new feature welcome screen. Our bad!
Thanks for your patience :)

- Bug fixes and under the hood optimizations

Thank you for the love and support!

Introducing: Video Frames!

Turn your videos into cinematic masterpieces with our new vintage inspired Video Frames. We have 5 beauties to choose from and you can combine them with your favorite presets, edits and effects for a feel that’s 100% you. We can't wait to see the art you create.

Your subscription issues should now be fixed! We are so sorry for the trouble, thank your for your patience. We love you!

xx
Tezza

Alright everyone, cross your fingers, we hope this fixes your subscription issues!

xx
Cole & Tezza

Alright everyone, cross your fingers, we hope this fixes your subscription issues!

xx
Cole & Tezza
We have some super exciting updates coming next week! This update is an under the hood fix for subscriptions. Enjoy!

Shimmy, shimmy, shimmy! Why share a boring old photo when you can make it shimmy? Introducing our newest feature, named, you guessed it, SHIMMY. Add a little spice to your photos, it's our new favorite way to show off our work.
----
Oh, we also fixed some bugs! We can't wait to see the art that you create.

- Subscription bug fixes
- Better restore button

We hope you enjoy the new feature, Shimmy!

New FREE preset alert! Introducing: Lush.

We also fixed some bugs.

Enjoy!

Bugggggg fixes!
• Fixed the crash with vintage subtitles & videos
• Fixed the temperature coloring issue

Happy editing!
Just some minor bug fixes and UX tweaks.

Two new presets: Luxe and Mood 3!!

We've also fixed the subtitles bug.

Summer Fridays x Tezza

- We are thrilled to announce our collaboration with Summer Fridays and the launch of the beautiful Fridays preset
- The preset is gorgeous and exclusive to our subscribers, we hope you enjoy!

xx
Team Tezza

Introducing: Glitter & Prism

Who's ready to make gorgeous, glowy, glittery photos and videos? Duh! We are! Check out Prism for a sick tricolor vibe while you're at it.

xx

The Tezza Team

Newwwwwww Presets! Natural, Ray Gal, Blue Baby, and Softee!

Thank you all for getting us to 10 million downloads. We love this beautiful creative community.

xx

Team Tezza
A few under the hood tweaks to get ready for a biiiiiig update coming soon :)

HUGE UPDATE! 130+ brand new templates!

Please let us know if you find any bugs along the way, we want to make these the best templates ever.

We'd love to share in the art that you create #TezzaApp.

Tezza & Cole
A few little bug fixes and cleanup. We have something amazing coming in February :) Buckle up!

Oops, we got a makeover :) introducing an entirely new look, inspired by vintage fashion magazines.

Bug Fixes:
- Stop Motion quality has been fixed
- Slider sensitivity has been fixed

New features include:
- New paper, dust, and light leak overlays
- An editorial "Line" template pack
- A new logo, fonts, colors, and other goodies throughout

LIVE. CREATE. REPEAT.

We hope you all are enjoying our beautiful new update! There's much more in the works :) But for now, we have a few bug fixes:

- Images are no longer blurry when loaded into editor
- Grain is better and more visible, no more white specs
- A lovely new loading spinner when importing images and video

Keep creating, and keep sending us feedback along the way!

We hope you all are enjoying our beautiful new update! There's much more in the works :) But for now, we have a few bug fixes:

- Images are no longer blurry when loaded into editor
- Grain is better and more visible, no more white specs
- A lovely new loading spinner when importing images and video

Keep creating, and keep sending us feedback along the way!

Introducing: Cocoa & Rose

Two new presets and limited loungewear sets available on shoptezza.com

A little note about the presets:

Cocoa - Like milk poured into your morning coffee, Cocoa brings a luscious chocolate touch to your work. A bit moody and understated, we love nestling into Cocoa on our cozier photo and video shoots.

Rose - Rose brings a perfect powdered sugar dusting of pink to your photography. Ideal for making your work just a bit softer while maintaining an editorial feel.

We also fixed some issues with stop motion! Thank you for your feedback there.

We can't wait to see the art that you create.

xx

Team Tezza

New goodies!
- Beautiful new texture packs: poster, glass, shadow and plastic
- A brand new image picker. It's much faster and easier to organize.

Some bug fixes
- Video bug fixes! We know a lot of you have had issues saving videos, this update should fix it.


As always, please let us know if you have any questions or concerns on Instagram! @tezzaapp

Introducing the Angel template pack, inspired by Sophie Barton and Heaven & Earth collection. All proceeds from the collection will be donated to Sophie's Place. Check out the "Shop" tab to learn more about the amazing things happening at Sophie's Places across the country.

xx

Tezza

Introducing: Dime. A brand new preset brought to you by Tezza x BÉIS.
---------------

Our founder, Tezza, photographed the new Grey Line Collection for BÉIS, our favorite beautifully functional travel brand. This preset was created to edit the campaign and will bring all of your photos a lovely, warm, grey glow.

Oops! We fixed the edit button bug - thank you for your patience and support. We hope you love the new Creamy and Milky Presets!

-------------

It’s like the feeling of slow mornings, flaky pastries, fresh linen, sunday drives, fresh florals, when the cream hits your coffee. Introducing the Creamy & Milky Preset, inspired by our new Creamy Kit and used to edit every photo in the collection. We can't wait to see the art that you create.

.... we also fixed a bunch of bugs :)
A little bug fix, with lots more bug fixes coming this week! Thank you for the love and support as we continue to make Tezza the best app it can be.

Lots and lots and lots of bug fixes! Thank you for your support and patience as we've tracked down all the bugs you've been reporting.

xx

Team Tezza
More bug fixes! Caught a few more in the last update :) happy editing!

We have fixed the black screen bug!! If you had an issue where your photos were showing up as a black screen when trying to edit that bug is now fixed! Thank you for your patience and for all of the help tracking down the bug, we love you all.

xx

Team Tezza

10 gorgeous, stunning, beautiful new frames inspired by film and classic cinema.

Live. Create. Repeat.

xx

Team Tezza

We found a bunch of bugs and fixed them! Thanks for the patience and support :) new presets coming soooooon :)

xx

Team Tezza

MAKE ART, EAT CAKE

We partnered with the The Caker, an artist-baker icon, to create your new favorite preset, CAKE, and to bring you the best cake kit you’ve ever had, COCONUT RASPBERRY LIME LEAF. Have fun baking this cake and making art while doing so, and don’t forget to tag and share @tezza @thecaker.
